name: Black Sheep
description:
Sometime at the end of the last century near the withered town of Lingyi, dusk fell upon the electric gates of the Junior High. A passionate girl who could never become a black sheep opened her hands and embraced the earth.
Her dear friend Li Xiangfan, someone who once knew everything, had not a single word to say.


""Hush, don't speak of the black sheep, its instinct is to live amongst the flock."。"




· Moderate elements of psychological horror, integrated into urban legends within a school setting.
· Collect information left amongst the ruins and uncover the truth behind the year's events.
· Beware of monsters born out of malice, and discover their true identities.




· The game consists of five chapters, with each chapter corresponding to a series of events that happened in the past year, with the player acts as a bystander in these events. As you watch on from the sidelines, how you choose to save the black sheep is up to you.




· This is a story-driven adventure game, where even things that seem simple at first may be difficult to pin down... Players must search for the truth by gathering opinions, changing their perspective, and assuming different identities until the butcher in the flock is found.
